duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform validation testing of polyclonal and monoclonal antibodies using techniques such as western blotting, immunocytochemistry, immunohistochemistry, and flow cytometry.
Purify polyclonal and monoclonal antibodies for immunoassay development and manufacturing needs.
Conduct analyses to demonstrate quality and competency of antibody preparations.
Manage inventories of antibodies, cell lines, tissue sections, and test reagents.
Maintain organized and updated records of analyses.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's of Science degree in related field (Master's preferred)
